definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: (poet.) beloved (NH id., Aram. yadiydo0)—cstr. [[יְדִיד]] De 33:12; sf. [[לִידִידִי]] Is 5:1, Is 5:1, Je 11:15; [[לִידִידוֹ]] Ps 127:2; pl. sf. [[יְדִידֶיְ]] Ps 60:7, Ps 108:7; f. [[יְדִידׂת]] Ps 45:1; [[יְדִידוֹת]] Ps 84:2; —
my beloved, used by proph. of ´[[י]] under fig. of husbandman Is 5:1, Is 5:1; so my (thy, his) beloved Je 11:15, Ps 60:7 = Ps 108:7, Ps 127:2; beloved, of Benj. as beloved by ´[[י]] De 33:12.
lovely, [[מַה־יְּדִידוֹת מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶיְ]] Ps 84:2 how lovely are thy habitations !
fpl. as abstr. subst. [[שִׁיר יְדִידׂת]] Ps 45:1 = a song of love.
